extension.description: The skin features a modern and elegant design, with a rounded model that ensures a comfortable experience while using it.[CR]It is recommended to use the latest version of Kodi.
Skin yang memiliki tampilan modern dan elegan, dengan model yang membulat membuat anda merasa nyaman menggunakan skin ini.[CR]Disarankan menggunakan kodi versi terbaru.
extension.disclaimer: This skin includes the Roboto+NotoCJK font option if you are using languages that involve kanji, hangul, etc. (this may potentially slow down your device's performance).[CR]This skin might be slightly less suitable for touchscreens and mouse navigation.
